verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] 's decision to [V: cancel] [ARG1: his historic meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] left South Korea 's President " perplexed " and sparked angry protests in Seoul . One sign read : " We condemn Trump . "
